solution_line_template: Every third shopper buys a package of candied yams, so the store will need {total_shoppers} / {shopper_frequency} = <<{total_shoppers}/{shopper_frequency}={packages_needed}>>{packages_needed} packages.

At {packages_per_box} packages per bulk box, the store will need {packages_needed} / {packages_per_box} = <<{packages_needed}/{packages_per_box}={bulk_boxes_needed}>>{bulk_boxes_needed} bulk boxes of candied yams.
